item.description:
This is a very fun, extreme series of races taking place along the CT River. There could be wet sand, dirt paths, rocky hills, grassy knolls, stair climbs - plus great music and people along the way!

Afterwards, you can celebrate with great food and a free beer for participating!

Deadline to register for the June event is June 13. There will be one held on July 30 and August 27 as well.

This isn't once you've done one, you've done them all -- No course is the same!!

Check out the website for more information on registering, the race, etc.

Hope to see you all there!!!
item.name: Xtreme Scrambles 5k Series Events
